price: Sε Ɔpε a Ɔbɛyi mo afiri hͻ na Ɔde abɔdeε foforͻ aba (abɛsi moanan mu).
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
